Put almost 500 hours into this game and planned on many more, however i cant play the game anymore. after spending close to $50 in a week on just skins for this game i am now unable to play on official servers due to not being able to validate vac files. I've uninstalled steam, uninstalled csgo, verified the files a million times, ran everything as admin, and even formatted my hard drive and tried a different ssd, ive checked for bad sectors, steam support for csgo isnt replying and i have been removed from every match after 5 rounds or so and given a comp cooldown. Now a week before i can play again and next time it happens a month. Im not going to put in that much time trying to play a game that doesnt want me to play it.
CSS > CSGO, always, but it's still very fun and competitive!
